[
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Variable(
            BracedVariableVariable(
                BracedVariableVariable {
                    start: Span(
                        1,
                        7,
                    ),
                    variable: LiteralString {
                        span: Span(
                            1,
                            9,
                        ),
                        value: "foo",
                    },
                    end: Span(
                        1,
                        14,
                    ),
                },
            ),
        ),
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                1,
                15,
            ),
        ),
    },
]
